name: Vr Funbox
summary: Vr funbox is a vr sandbox with features others don't like Satisfying Breaking, 6 different scenes, over 70 items (and more to come), Physics gun, Spawn gun, Tool gun that can make you shrink to the size of a mouse or grow to the size of a giant, uses auto hands for good physics and grab pose, cutting, a fan that can push objects, climbing, a zero gravity switch with a push of a button, Drone, Black hole, CAKE, Material gun, and see through the eyes of most objects
